transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir good morning.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Ye Kartik ji se baat ho rahi hai na Kartik parts se.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Kartik ji mera naam Saransh hai main IndiaMART ke head office se baat kar raha hu business manager Shaurya ji ka manager baat kar raha tha actually aapka na do din pehle customer care pe connect aaya tha to actually maine Shaurya se bola tha aapse baat karenge kuch issue aa raha tha aapko buyleads ko lekar right sir to aaj kya unhone aapse discuss kiya tha buyleads ke regarding.
Customer: Ha sir convert conversion nahi ho raha hai itni leads maine consume kari hai.
Executive: Hanji hanji.
Customer: Convert nahi mil raha hai jabki itni roz ka mera agar score dekhenge consume karne ka to aapko achcha milega activity meri achchi milegi fir bhi.
Executive: Ha buyleads ka main dekh raha hu ki aapka consumption bahut achcha hai right vahi baat conversion ki hai uske liye main aapko bas ek suggestion dena chahunga jo aap logo ke paas purchase pattern ke basis pe inquiries generate ho rahe hai right koshish kijiye ki aap vahan se conversion nikalne ki koshish karein kyuki jo customer aapko samne se call kar rahe hai inquiries or buyleads right vahan pe aapki conversion ki probability jyada hai jaise abhi aap logo ne recently kuch buyleads consume kiya Aurangabad se Mangesh ji restaurant table and chair thi right sir ek aapne buyleads consume ki thi kal Muradabad se Azad ji restaurant table chair thi right usse pehle aapne ek buyleads consume kari thi Sundargarh se luxury dining chair thi right sir to yahan par basically kya hai jo buyleads aap consume kar rahe hai unke basis pe jo aap logo ki visibility ek to wo enhance hoti hai right or jo customer aapko directly call kar rahe hai na as an inquiry unko aap approach kijiye to conversion ke liye aapko benefit bhi achcha milega aur vahan pe conversion bhi mil payega.
Customer: Sir inquiry to bahut kam aa rahi hai ye bhi to ek mera issue hai.
Executive: Main bata raha hu inquiry ka main bata raha hu jaise Ajmer se aaj hi ek requirement aaya hai aapne dekha hoga.
Customer: Aaj hi aaya hai baki aap pure month mein check kariye.
Executive: Main khol raha hu abhi vahi vahi discuss kar raha hu ye dekhiye 50 30 ki requirement hai jo ki kya kehte hai banquet hall chair ki hai ya askiya askiya karke right baat hui unse.
Customer: Baat bataiye aap.
Executive: Baat hui hai baat hui hai abhi whatsapp pe photo bhejne ka unhone bola tha par abhi.
Customer: Photo bhejna isme matlab ek cheez dhyan rakhiye jab aapki Ajay ji se baat ho gayi hai abhi aap photo bhejenge right koshish kijiyega inhe within ek ghante ek ghante mein right dobara se follow up kijiyega kyuki ye dhyan rakhiyega unhone aapko requirement.
Customer: Bilkul follow up to pakka mein le raha hu.
Executive: Ha par ye hai ki direct inquiries or calls bahut kam aa rahe hai bahut kam.
Executive: Sir ek requirement aur yahan par mujhe dikha raha hai jo aap logo ke liye yahan pe generate hua tha Udaipur se 23rd November ko 30 pieces ka baat hui inse banquet hall chair.
Customer: Kitne pieces ka.
Executive: 30 pieces ka banquet hall chairs ka Sanchit ji.
Customer: Nahi inse baat hui to ye aaj kal aaj kal karte karte inhone bahut time nikal diya.
Executive: Yahi to aapko bataunga 23 tarikh ko unhone inquiry dali thi dekhiye aise customer jo aapko delay kar rahe hai lekin inhone inquiry dali thi ho sakta hai ki unhe kabhi se kam pricing na mil raha ho right inse ek baar.
Customer: Meri baat suniye jo inhone price batai na uspe maine inko quote kar diya pehle maine jyada batai thi fir maine inhone jitna bataya ki mere ko itne mein chahiye itne mein bhi de diya fir bhi aaj kal aaj kal kar rahe hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To ab uska kya karna raha.
Executive: Uske liye to sir customer ko aapko sahi se matlab baat karna padega sir agar aapko karna hai to clear nahi karna hai to khatam karte hai actually dekhiye aise jo customers hai ye market mein aur logo se bhi rate le rahe honge aapki quotation ke sath right sir vahan par kya hai ki agar inhe aapki quotation samajh mein aati hai aur aapke market ke rate competitive hai right to ye aapse deal karenge varna nahi karenge lekin conversion jo hai ye bahut subjective matter hai right samne wale ke dimag mein kya chal raha hai right kya wo deal karna chah raha hai nahi karna chah raha hai right ab usne aapki quotation mangi kya wo char logo se aur quotation nahi mangega jaise 23 tarikh ko inhone requirement dali hai ho sakta hai ki inhone socha hoga ki main 30 tarikh ko purchase karunga right abhi ye char din aur logo se quotation le rahe hai thik hai na hamara kam kya hai hum follow up kar sakte hai unko best to best rate de sakte hai ki wo first time humse jude to next time wo hamare paas automatically aayega right sir vahi hume try karna hai ab jaise 21 tarikh ko customer aur hai Sanchor se inhone dala hai iron frame leather seat banquet hall Ibrahim karke right inhone aapka portal open kara product dekha samajh mein aaya inhone requirement dal di right sir ab ye customer leta hai ki nahi leta hai wo totally depend karega customer ki choice ke upar aap samajh rahe hai hamara hamara purpose kya hai ki koi customer agar aapke product ko search kar raha hai to inquiry aapki bane aur ye inquiry jo main aapko bol raha hu follow karne ke liye uska ek reason hai hamare paas 10000 log jude hue hai aapki industry mein aapke shahar se Jodhpur se shayad 15 nahi hai 100 se 150 log jude hue hai right ab wo un logo ko chhod ke bhi wo agar aapko inquiry dal raha hai aur us inquiry ko agar hum best rate dekar convert kar pate hai right to vahan par hamare chances jyada hai kyuki wo usse hamara product samajh mein aa raha hai ek customer jab aapko inquiry dale na to product ka pricing to aapne dala hai portal pe product bhi vahan par dikh raha hai right sir to agar wo pricing ke liye comfortable hai product ki image ko dekh ke samajh pa raha hai to obviously wo kahin na kahin okay hai use bas negotiation ki jarurat hai right to aap use best rate provide karke convert kijiye sir aur IndiaMART sabse sabse important pata hai kya hai sir aap logo ko opportunity deta hai ki koi bhi customer agar generate ho raha hai right to ye aapke samne hai aap ise convert kaise karte hai wo direct skill aapke upar depend karta hai sir hum aapko aur opportunity de sakte hai aapka ek customer ka 19 November ka requirement yahan pe dikha raha hai rattan cane restaurant wooden chair doctor karke koi the inhone specially requirement dala tha aapke portal pe aap right sir ab is customer se aap kaise conversion nikalte hai wo smartly aapke upar depend karega sir isliye hum bol rahe hai jo buyleads jaise aapne bataya na ki consume karta hu ye jo aapke purchase pattern hai usi ke basis pe aapki requirement generate ho rahi hai to day by day jitni aap buyleads consume karenge usi ke basis pe aapki conversion ki probability badhti chali jayegi.
Customer: Rattan cane chair wala.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir aap mujhe koi support nahi hai wo nahi hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Badtameezi kar raha hai.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Awaaz aa rahi hai main ek kaam kar raha hu ha main ek kaam kar raha hu aapke sath ek whatsapp group create kara raha hu usme jo bhi mere paas bulk order ke leads vagera aate hai na wo wo cheez main aap logo ko kuch buyleads bulk order se directly sir abhi jo aapne last mein baat kari na ki ek rattan cane chair ki requirement thi.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Wo kya naam hai uska customer ka ek baar main mere LMS mein search karta hu.
Executive: Ha main aapko whatsapp bhi kar deta hu wo detail jo mere paas show kar rahi hai to aap usse match karke upar check kar lijiye thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Hmm kitni der lagegi sir.
Executive: Thik hai sir main whatsapp pe karta hu detail.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting conversions from buyleads.

- Inquiries are very less.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested focusing on purchase pattern inquiries.

- Executive provided details of potential customers.

- Executive offered to create a WhatsApp group for leads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share customer details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, conversion, inquiries, whatsapp group
